arts.ttl: Wolfsburg deliver five-star performance in Leipzig
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg secured a resounding 5-1 victory over RB Leipzig, with Mohamed Amoura scoring twice in a match that showcased Wolfsburg's clinical attack and aggressive defending. Marco Rose's side entered the match hoping to secure his 100th Bundesliga win as Leipzig coach, but faced a Wolfsburg team growing in confidence and running an average of five kilometres more per match in their last two games.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News: RB Leipzig push Benjamin Sesko to the Gunners - but there's a problem
arts.sum: Benjamin Sesko signed a new RB Leipzig contract in the summer to continue his development in a familiar environment. After his extension, Sesko explained that he decided to stay and continue his development in the Bundesliga for at least another season, but this decision is looking increasingly questionable.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leipzig crisis deepens, Stuttgart draw, Freiburg snap skid
arts.sum: In the most significant result of the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs, VfL Wolfsburg dismantled wobbling RB Leipzig with a 5-1 shellacking. VfB Stuttgart (wobbling themselves) could only manage a draw while Freiburg, Leverkusen, and Augsburg all earned wins.

arts.ttl: Special Velvet RB Leipzig 24-25 'Jingle' Kit Released - Limited to 2009 Pieces
arts.sum: RB Leipzig has just released a special velvet shirt to celebrate the upcoming Christmas 2024.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Wolfsburg preview: Hosts in need of a response
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will look to end a five-game winless run in all competitions when they welcome Wolfsburg to the Red Bull Arena for Saturdayâ€™s Bundesliga clash.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
After European games for some German clubs in midweek, it is a return to Bundesliga action this weekend with Alex Jack taking us through all nine games.
